description: Welcome to The Rows at Rockheights, an exclusive collection of five brand-new, thoughtfully designed 3-bedroom, 3.5 bathroom townhomes in the heart of Esquimalt. Nestled at 910 Old Esquimalt Road, this modern END UNIT offers an exceptional blend of style, comfort, and convenience. Featuring a private garage, spacious open-concept living areas, premium appliances, and an energy-efficient heat pump system. Perfectly situated near Gorge Vale Golf Course, top-rated schools, and scenic parks, this community provides the ideal setting for families and professionals alike. Don't miss out on these stunning townhomes that offer the best of contemporary West Coast living!
